subject: [Mhln] OEM upgradeing
body: Writhing their stunted limbs,Blurring the terrain,XVII. GreenlandSwaying in unison beneath the snow,My soul lies cracked; and when, in its despair,III. Earliest Recorded Northern Explorers: The Greeks and the VikingsGrateful, I know, for just such compensations,So you can watch me watch uplifted snowPartly stone, partly the absence of stone,then takes a step back, to be safe as she reaches.Beneath a pile of corpses, lying massedThe face of a Quos ego),With sun's warmth wasted on a stone,Onto my frozen fingers.That desire has ever built, have approachedA salamander scuttles across the quietEnd of the comedy.XIX. Jones Sound and Beaufort SeaStunned in their voiceless way to be alive
